VARDESC: In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Pain

In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Feeling unwell a lot of the time
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Work around the home
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Not being able to do the things you used to do
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Anxiety
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Feeling down or depressed
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Feelings of sadness
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Fears about the cancer spreading
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Worry that the results of treatment are beyond your control
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Uncertainty about the future
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Learning to feel in control of your situation
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Keeping a positive attitude
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Feelings about death and dying
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Changes in sexual feelings
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Changes in your sexual relationships
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Concerns about the worries of those close to you
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: More choice about which cancer specialists you see
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: More choice about which hospital you attend
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Reassurance by medical staff that the way you feel is normal
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Hospital staff attending promptly to your physical needs
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Hospital staff acknowledging, and showing sensitivity to, your feelings and emotional needs
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Being given written information about the important aspects of care
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Being given information (written, diagrams, drawings) about aspects of managing your illness and side-effects at home
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Being given explanations of those tests for which you would like explanations
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Being adequately informed about the benefits and side-effects of treatments before you choose to have them
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Being informed about your test results as soon as feasible
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Being informed about cancer which is under control or diminishing (that is, remission)
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Being informed about things you can do to help yourself to get well

In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Having access to professional counseling (eg, psychologist, social worker, counsellor, nurse specialist) if you, family or friends need it
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: To be given information about sexual relationships
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Being treated like a person not just another case
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Being treated in a hospital or clinic that is as physically pleasant as possible
In the last month, which was your level of need for help with: Having one member of hospital staff with whom you can talk to about all aspects of your condition, treatment and follow-up
